newsitem.title: UK: Stagecoach sees satisfactory current trading.
newsitem.headline: Stagecoach sees satisfactory current trading.

text.p: British bus and train operator Stagecoach Plc is seeing satisfactory trading, chairman Brian Souter told the annual meeting.
"I am pleased to report that current trading at all our companies is satisfactory," he said.
Souter said Stagecoach had a stronger base for future development and a wide portfolio which gave access to a range of business opportunities.

"I believe this strategy (of bus and rail business) will...help to balance any regulatory exposure in the future and make our future group development less susceptible to any single area of business risk," Souter said.
Souter said Stagecoach was creating a UK bus management board to ensure continued focus on development of this business.
